mapper.sql: id, crn, name, credits, precrn, couLev, couSec, classroom, startDate, endDate, day, startTime, endTime, capa, facultyid, info, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select: select status from CourseView where crn = #{crn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from CourseView where status = '1' or status = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into Course (id, crn, name, credits, precrn, couLev, couSec, classroom, startDate, endDate, day, startTime, endTime, capa, facultyid, info, createtime, updatetime, comment) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{crn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{precrn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coulev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cousec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capa,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{facultyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update Course
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
credits = #{credits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
precrn = #{precrn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
couLev = #{coulev,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
couSec = #{cousec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classroom = #{classroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startDate = #{startdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endDate = #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
day = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
capa = #{capa,jdbcType=INTEGER},
facultyid = #{facultyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where crn = #{crn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update Course set crn = #{crn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credits = #{credits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, precrn = #{precrn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, couLev = #{coulev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, couSec = #{cousec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classroom = #{classroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startDate = #{startdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endDate = #{enddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, capa = #{capa,jdbcType=INTEGER}, facultyid = #{facultyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
